Nolan E. Meyer

              Nolan E. Meyer

            I’m a current undergraduate student-athlete at Macalester College, pursuing a B.A. in statistics (expected May 2023) along with a minor in computer science. I’m working towards a future career in data analysis, data science, sports analytics, or other related fields. I have a strong passion for numbers and their practical applications, as well as working to solve meaningful problems that can have an impact for the greater good. Hosted on this website is a collection of my works in this field, ranging from school group projects, internships, and independent projects.
